gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 124, 76ers 114
gameRecap.excerpt: Led by Zion Williamsons 33 points, eight rebounds and six assists, the Pelicans defeated the 76ers, 124-114. CJ McCollum (20 points, five assists) and Jonas Valanciunas (19 points, six rebounds) added a combined 39 points for the Pelicans in the victory, while Tyrese Maxey tallied 33 points and three assists for the 76ers in the losing effort. The Pelicans improve to 10-9 on the season, while the 76ers fall to 12-6.
